CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 12, 1952, pg. 2, reads: "Alphas Sponsor Duquesne U. Program - Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity sponsored a Carver Day program in 'Little Theatre' on the Duquesne University campus here Monday with Judge Homer S. Brown as main speaker. Left to right: Judge Homer S. Brown, Father Vernon Gallagher, Mrs. Alma Illery, Father Gerald Walsh and Edgar N. Duncan, all of whom spoke on the program. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Edgar N. Duncan, Father Gerald Walsh, Alma Illery, Father Vernon Gallagher, and Judge Homer S. Brown standing in "Little Theatre," Duquesne University for Carver Day program
